Key Match Events: Buddy Hield and Lindy Waters III combined for 49 points and 10 3-pointers in the Warriors' 124-106 comeback victory over the New Orleans Pelicans.
Buddy Hield scored 25 points on 8-for-10 shooting in the second half.
Lindy Waters III scored 17 points over a two-quarter span, helping the Warriors win by 25 points.
The Warriors had a 36-point advantage from behind the arc, sinking 21 3-pointers compared to just nine for the Pelicans.
Lindy Waters III set a career-high with eight rebounds.
Buddy Hield scored 19 points on 6-for-8 shooting and a perfect 4-for-4 from deep in the fourth quarter.
Brandin Podziemski scored 19 points and dished out five assists.
Moses Moody scored 17 points and shot 5-for-6 from three.
Jonathan Kuminga added 17 points, including a highlight-reel transition dunk.
